Hell's Ram.name: Hell's Ram
Hell's Ram.flavor: Using a simple but brutal technique, you slam your gnarled forehead into your shocked foe.
Hell's Ram.attack:
Dexterity + 4 or Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Dexterity + 6 or Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Hell's Ram.onHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Ride the Devil's Tail.name: Ride the Devil's Tail
Ride the Devil's Tail.flavor: With a flick of your tail, you hook your foe and twist your body around into a new position.
Ride the Devil's Tail.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you
Ride the Devil's Tail.effect: You shift half your speed, ending in a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Flame Blade.name: Flame Blade
Flame Blade.flavor: Calling upon your infernal ties and the skills of ancient Turathi masters, you unleash the fires of your soul to burn your foes.
Flame Blade.effect: Until the stance ends, your melee attacks deal 1d6 extra fire damage and gain the fire keyword. When you hit with a melee attack, you can use a free action to end this stance and increase the extra fire damage on that attack to 5d6.
